dict.acceptation: 论述；探讨（与of连用）；交涉；商议；

sent.orig: I ate so much candy after I went trick-or-treat that I was sick for a week.
sent.trans: 我去搞“trick-or-treat”之后吃的糖太多了，病了一个礼拜。

sent.orig: So, because you want me to treat patients, you aren't letting me treat patients.
sent.trans: 也就是说因为你想让我治疗病人你不让我治疗病人？

sent.orig: Treat your friend as you treat yourself.
sent.trans: 对待朋友像对自己一样。

sent.orig: You might say Americans treat their pets like they treat their children -- sometimes even better.
sent.trans: 你也可以说，美国人待他们的宠物如同待他们的孩子一样--有时甚至更好。

sent.orig: Treat Gossip as Lesson, treat admiration as a warning.
sent.trans: 是非当教育，赞美作警惕。
